item.title: The Bigger Picture
item.description:
This sermon was preached in February of 1989 for Transfiguration Sunday. The text is from Luke 9:34, presumably making this sermon the equivalent of Transfiguration Sunday C.

The Sermon refers to Buena Vista Park in Alma, WI. Here it is on Google Maps.

item.title: WHEN THERE'S MORE HERE THAN IS HERE
item.description:
This is a sermon from 1995, preached for Transfiguration Sunday C. I found two copies of this sermon in the archives - one was black and white, the other was higlighted. I’m including the highlighted version here.

The sermon refers to “A Study of Generations”. I’ve found an article referring to the study in PDF form here.

Here’s a link to the actual study.

item.title: When God Breaks Through
item.description:
This sermon was preached in 1997 in Seymour, Wisconsin. It was preached on the morning of a Packer Game - The NFC Championship in Green Bay before Super Bowl XXXI.

The gospel text is from The Baptism of our Lord B, Mark 1:1-11.

Audio is available.

item.title: The Abundant Life
item.description: Date of sermon unknown. I would presume this sermon is from the late 1960’s or early 1970’s. A note is written at the top, denoting it as the Second Sunday of Epiphany C.

item.title: FOR GRUMBLERS, THE BREAD OF LIFE
item.description:
This sermon was preached at Emmanuel Lutheran Church, as a part of a “Polka Service” featuring music by “Jerry Voelker and His Jolly Gents”. The text is from the Eleventh Sunday of Pentecost B.

Exodus 16: 11-12 is listed as the sermon text.
